sub_title: Display & Native Specialist at GroupM Nexus | MSc. Strategic Marketing
summary:
I am a graduate from Maastricht University with a MSc. in International Business - Strategic Marketing. After obtaining my Bachelor of Business Administration at Zuyd University of Applied Sciences, I decided to pursue my Master's in the field that I am most passionate about. My interests lie in researching and satisfying customers needs by understanding the relationships between brands and its customers and the current business environment; thus creating value for the organization as well as the end user. In addition, I am also passionate about data and utilizing the latest customer- and marketing trends in order to improve the performance of KPIs.

During my study, I was privileged to spent one year in Asia for my study exchange and internship. I have also explored the world after my study to further broaden my mind. I describe this period as the most valuable and educational experience of my life. I have had the honour to be surrounded by people from all over the world, which has enabled me to develop strong communication skills and to perform well with people from different backgrounds.

Over the years, I have gained invaluable experience every business professional needs to reach key deliverables. I have developed a wide range of applicable skills, including planning, problem-solving, excellent communication, analytical thinking and teamwork. I describe myself as an open-minded go-getter, which allows me to be motivated and energized in every workplace. Moreover, I am constantly looking for opportunities to learn and I can easily adapt to new surroundings. 

Feel free to connect!

school.name: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Greenhouse is a brand & performance agency with over 500 experts in data, media, creative and
tech. We love to work with brands that appreciate the skills, drive and vision we bring to the table.
By investing in talent and good ideas since 2006, Greenhouse has evolved into the innovative,
creative and entrepreneurial agency our clients ask for. Greenhouse, a WPP agency.
www.greenhousegroup.com.

-Setup and ongoing optimization and management of display advertising campaigns for multiple clients.
-Management of ad budgets, A/B testing ad creatives, keyword research, setting up audiences, and optimizing for conversions and KPIs.
-Analysis of campaign data and reporting on recommendations and strategy.
-Create testing roadmaps, media plans, traffic ads and improve campaigns with a focus on driving the best return on effort and investment.
-Measure and prioritize testing plans in areas such as creative, audience segmentation, placement selection, and 3rd-party tool evaluation.
-Synthesize findings into relevant insights to shape media plans and report on best practices.
profile_positions.title: Programmatic Display Specialist | Wavemaker

profile_positions.description:
-Improving and innovating the patient experience journey for MUMC+ by performing an impact analysis on stakeholders using 15 Care-innovation themes provided by MUMC+
-Offering implementation advice for MUMC+ through extensive desk research and in-depth interviews with hospital staff.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Transport 2.0: The Road to Change, Sustainability and Efficiency. 

The Business Case was a 15-week research assignment/thesis that was written for Heuschen & Schrouff. 

-Collecting and analyzing data regarding sustainable transportation and governmental regulations for the transportation department
-Field research with experts on this topic
-Formulate strategic options
-To give feasible recommendations
profile_positions.title: Logistics Researcher

profile_positions.description:
HR activities:
-Establish and maintain administrative systems, reporting requirements and documentation.
-Assist in improving and implementing HR policies and procedures.
-Assist the HR-manager during the recruitment and hiring process.
-Coordinate all recruitment activities and induction process for new starters.
-Develop/improve diversity and inclusion strategies within the workplace.
-Co-organize the annual company trip and create the company’s culture book.

Marketing activities:
-Perform in-depth market analysis, research on customers and competitors.
-Collect and analyze data to provide valuable business insights- and opportunities to the marketing department.
-Support the marketing department in daily administrative tasks.
-Assist in creating marketing and advertising promotional activities.
-Improve online marketing strategy (FB & IG, email, website) and SEO.
-Develop strategies to build and strengthen relationships with shareholders.
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Human Resources

volunteer_experiences.description:
Enactus is an international non-profit organization that brings together student, academic and business leaders who are committed to using the power of entrepreneurial action to improve the quality of life and standard of living for people in need.

Guided by academic advisors and business experts, the student leaders of Enactus create and implement community empowerment projects around the globe. The experience not only transforms lives, it helps students develop the kind of talent and perspective that are essential to leadership in an ever-more complicated and challenging world.

• Develop and implement strategies to ensure long-term success of the team and its operations. • Lead in strengthening the Enactus brand and image on-campus and in the community 
• Serve as a chief representative of Enactus Leaders to other university and community entities. 
• Assist in the identification of new mentors, partners, and other stakeholders. 
• Mentor team leaders in supporting the mission and vision of the team. 
• Maintain a working relationship with the designated Enactus NL Program Manager 
• Lead change management processes in the team and create initiatives to build a positive, vision-based culture in the team. 
• Serve as a positive example for all team members in motivation, attitude, judgment, communication, and leadership.

Mentor program: Assigned to corporate partner Alliander based in Arnhem

National Competition 2015 & 2016

Winner of Enactus Team Spirit Award 2016
